dmca.title: India v West Indies Series 2007 infringments- EchoStar_NRID14362
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 29, 2007 10:45 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: India v West Indies Series 2007 infringments-
EchoStar_NRID14362
Importance: High
Sensitivity: Confidential

Dear Sir, 

The site http://www.desicricnmore.forums1.net, is infringing the
copyright of our client, Echostar Satellite L.L.C by offering links to
illegal online streams for the international cricket series between
India and the West Indies. 

The site is part of the www.forums1.net site and it would be ideal if we
could get them to remove the site- however we have been unable to find
any contact information for forums1.net. It would be greatly appreciated
if you could assist with us in taking action against this site.

Regards,

Mike Kiernan


Account Executive

Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House,
583 Fulham Road,
London,
SW6 5UA 

mikek@nr-online.com
http://www.nr-online.com 

tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1733


-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com]
Sent: 24 January 2007 14:05
To: nsmart123@hotmail.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: India v West Indies Series 2007 infringments-
EchoStar_NRID14362
Importance: High
Sensitivity: Confidential


Echostar: India v West Indies Series 2007 infringments-
EchoStar_NRID14362

NetResult Internal Reference:  EchoStar_NRID14362

Please quote the above EchoStar_NRID14362 reference in all
communications with us regarding this issue.


Dear Sirs,


We write on behalf of EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") the
exclusive broadband/Internet rights holder for USA, Mexico, Canada and
the Caribbean for the 2006 India vs. West Indies Cricket Tour (the
"Series").

We have noticed that your website, http://www.desicricnmore.forums1.net
is displaying Audio Visual (A/V) content from the above Series. As you
are aware, you've engaged in such display without obtaining authority or
authorization from EchoStar to do so.

Please be advised that your unauthorized use of EchoStar's intellectual
property constitutes an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive copyrights.
Please immediately cease all such infringing activities on any and all
of your web sites (and elsewhere) and confirm to us via email that you
have done so.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of EchoStar's rights or remedies,
all of which are expressly reserved.

Formal Declaration

I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced
above and that NetResult is authorized to act on its behalf with respect
to internet monitoring and compliance.

On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights with respect to the
content at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith
belief that use of such A/V in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the owner, its agent, or the law.

I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

We thank you for your cooperation.

Yours sincerely,


Mike Kiernan

NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA
Tel: 0207 471 1730

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
